content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (5.0, -73.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position 5.0, -73.0)

### Copper plate factory
Consists of the following entities:
- Stone furnace (position -18.0, -49.0) with copper-plate output
- Assembling machine (position -21.5, 25.5) for crafting automation-science-pack
- Inserter (not explicitly listed in the entities but implied for operation)
- Beltgroup (not explicitly listed in the entities but implied for operation)

### Electricity generator at position (-18.5, 19.5)
Consists of:
- Steam engine (position -18.5, 19.5)
- Boiler (position -13.5, 20.0)
- Offshore pump (position -11.5, 26.5)
- Small electric poles (positions -16.5, 19.5; -16.5, 20.5; -16.5, 21.5; -19.5, 22.5)

### Pipe groups
Consists of:
- Pipe group (fluid system 41186) at position (-18.5, 16.5)
- Pipe group (fluid system 41189) at position (-12.5, 21.5)
- Pipe group (fluid system 41190) at position (-8.5, 21.5)
- Pipe group (fluid system 41192) at position (-10.5, 22.5)
- Pipe group (fluid system 41193) at position (-7.5, 23.5)

### Lab at position (-17.5, 23.5)
Consists of:
- Lab (position -17.5, 23.5)

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when attempting to extract items from the furnace
- Ensure that the furnace contains the item you are trying to extract. In this case, verify that the stone furnace at (5.0, -73.0) has copper plates available before attempting extraction.

### Errors when using extracting but being too far
- Make sure to move to the target entity where you want to extract from before extracting items.

### Errors when placing into a tile which is occupied by another entity
- Ensure you can place an entity to a tile before attempting placing.
